summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North and West Sixtieth Street from Phinney Avenue to the West boundary line of the City of Seattle in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 16206, creating Local Improvement District No. 1516 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
